text: Hey cuisine aficionados, I'm looking for a new digital food scale? Any recommendations?

<@U02618EV1>: I'm trying to find a link to the one I settled on. Has a nice tare button, g/oz switch with one press (pretty standard stuff) - but this one has a square glass plate WITH a stainless cover for it that is removable. So weighing raw meats is fine on the stainless cover cause it can go in the dishwasher
Yes! That's exactly what I need.

attachments.text: Shop Cuisinart at the Amazon Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets store. Free Shipping on eligible items. Everyday low prices, save up to 50%.
attachments.fallback: Shop Cuisinart at the Amazon Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets store. Free Shipping on eligible items. Everyday low prices, save up to 50%.

text: I've had it about 5 years and changed the batteries once.
That sounds really great. I didn't even know I needed that
Can't seem to find a cord for Cyclops. Anyone seen one around?
i have a lightening cable is that's what ya need
I have extra lightening cables at my desk.
oops - sorry - got snagged by a standup. Jenny got me one. Thanks all!
